context: A security incident involving a possible compromised user account delivering ransomware-related files was reported. The user account dropped a ransomware-related file on several devices, including the host `vnevado-win11t`. The file names involved were `get-userprttoken.ps1`, `characterical.zip`, and `characterical.zip.lockbit`. Automated remediation actions may be taken to disable the compromised account.
question: A ransomware payload was remotely launched on another device. Can you identify the host name of this second device where the ransomware payload was launched?
solution_steps: A user account with SID `S-1-5-21-1840191660-8534830288-125585561-1522` was observed dropping ransomware-related files on several devices.
A ransomware payload was remotely launched on the host `vnevado-win11u`.
